GetGroupList: SELECT mg.mg_id, mg.mg_group_id, mg.mg_group_name, mg.mg_group_description FROM manage_group mg WHERE mg.mg_is_use = true AND mg.mg_is_active = true;
AddGivePoint: INSERT INTO give_point (gp_id, gp_award_point_id, gp_emp_id, gp_remark, gp_is_use, gp_create_date, gp_create_by, gp_update_date, gp_update_by) VALUES($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9);
Usertabel: SELECT e.id, e.emp_name_th, e.emp_name_eng, e.e_mail, e.mobile, e.birthday, e.nickname, e.department_id, e.emp_no, e.start_work, e.end_work, e.work_year, e.work_month, e.work_day, e.citizen_id, e.period_time_id, e.salary, line_id, e.is_connect, e.company_id, e.oem_id, e.emp_position, e.user_pad_id, e.is_use, e.last_sync, e.update_date, e.create_date, e.employee_nation_id, e.account_number, e.account_name, d.dep_name FROM employee e left join department d on d.id = e.department_id WHERE e.company_id = $1 AND e.oem_id = $2 AND e.is_use = true and d.is_use = true AND ($3::uuid is null or d.id = $3);
chackuser: SELECT gm_id, gm_emp_id, gm_manage_group_id, gm_is_use, gm_create_date, gm_update_date FROM group_member;
departmentlist: select id, dep_name from department where is_use = true and company_id = $1 and oem_id = $2 and id = $3
ap_department: SELECT dap_id, dap_department_id, dap_award_point_id, dap_is_use, dap_create_date, dap_update_date FROM department_award_point WHERE dap_award_point_id = $1;
group_member: SELECT gm.gm_id, gm.gm_emp_id, gm.gm_manage_group_id, gm.gm_is_use, gm.gm_create_date, gm.gm_update_date FROM group_member gm WHERE gm.gm_is_use = true and gm.gm_manage_group_id = $1;
employee: SELECT id, emp_name_th, emp_name_eng, e_mail, mobile, birthday, nickname, department_id, emp_no, start_work, end_work, work_year, work_month, work_day, citizen_id, period_time_id, salary, line_id, is_connect, company_id, oem_id, emp_position, user_pad_id, is_use, last_sync, update_date, create_date, employee_nation_id, account_number, account_name, employee_type FROM employee WHERE is_use = true and id = $1;
employee_dep: SELECT id, emp_name_th, emp_name_eng, e_mail, mobile, birthday, nickname, department_id, emp_no, start_work, end_work, work_year, work_month, work_day, citizen_id, period_time_id, salary, line_id, is_connect, company_id, oem_id, emp_position, user_pad_id, is_use, last_sync, update_date, create_date, employee_nation_id, account_number, account_name, employee_type FROM employee WHERE is_use = true and department_id = $1;
SelectBudgetSum: SELECT cb_budget_year ,SUM(cb_budget_amount) FROM company_budget where cb_budget_year = $1 and cb_is_use = true group by cb_budget_year;
SelectAwardPoint: select ap.ap_point from award_point ap where ($1::uuid is null or ap.ap_company_id = $1) and ($2::uuid is null or ap.ap_id = $2)
SelectGivepointSum: SELECT gp.gp_award_point_id,COUNT(gp.gp_emp_id) as emp_count,(COUNT(gp.gp_emp_id) * ap.ap_point) as total FROM give_point gp left join award_point ap on gp.gp_award_point_id = ap.ap_id where gp.gp_is_use = true group by gp.gp_award_point_id , ap.ap_point;
UpdateEmployeePoint: UPDATE employee_point SET ep_point = $3+(select ep_point from employee_point WHERE ep_emp_id=$1) ,ep_update_date= $2 WHERE ep_emp_id=$1;
